A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found it derivative\, repetitive and\, ultimately\, boring. Not a single interesting idea in the whole film. The plot has plenty of holes and the use of CGI is uneven. They seem to have forgotten what the original films were about\, where is the magical\, surprising and imaginative universe of the three original films? Despite all the criticism\, the prequels are significantly better than the last three films.
